About

My research interests are in digital economics, with a particular focus on development economics. My thesis provides three impact evaluations of broadband internet deployment on various outcomes (political mobilization, house market, firm creations…). I am also interested in the economics of industrial organization.

I am currently a postdoctoral researcher at CREST (Télécom Paris, Institut Polytechnique de Paris). I am also an Associate Researcher at UMR Développement & Sociétés (Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne, IRD).

I hold a PhD in Economics from the Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne.

  • Member of the International Telecommunications Society
  • Member of the AFEDEV network
  • Co-organizer of the AuToMat Seminar
  • Co-organizer of the Journée d’études sur les données spatiales
